html:
Adds analyst comment

** Paris-listed shares in world's fourth largest carmaker Stellantis STLA.PA jump 3.5% after it announced a collaboration deal with Amazon AMZN.O

** The two companies said on Wednesday they would collaborate to develop cars and trucks with Amazon software in the dashboards, and deploy electric vans made by Stellantis on Amazon's delivery network (Full Story)

** "The market recognizes that Stellantis' collaboration with Amazon ... demonstrates that the traditional automaker is able to successfully compete even though the automotive sector is being disrupted by non-traditional players," Morningstar analyst Richard Hilgert says

** The stock, at its highest in around four months, is the third best performer on France's blue-chip index CAC 40 .FCHI, which rises 0.8%


(Reporting by Dagmarah Mackos)

(( Dagmarah.mackos@thomsonreuters.com ))
